long_description: The Columbia River Eat'N Tool combines a spork, screwdriver, pry tool, 3 metric wrenches and a bottle opener into 1 compact tool. Easily enjoy a meal or make an emergency fix on the trail! Solid, 3Cr13 stainless steel holds up to the rigors of all your outdoor adventures, year after year. 3 metric wrenches (10mm, 8mm and 6mm) in the handle are ready for repair jobs on the go. 4 in. overall length fits nicely in a pocket. Carabiner makes it a snap to attach the Eat'N Tool to a pack strap, daisy chain or belt loop.
short_description: The Columbia River Eat'N Tool combines a spork, screwdriver, pry tool, 3 metric wrenches and a bottle opener into 1 compact tool. Easily enjoy a meal or make an emergency fix on the trail!
